projects.title: QnA Agent
projects.bodyText:
This is an Frontline agent, just give the webiste link it will scrape everything that links to this website,
 and will train the Model using RAG pipeline and will work like a QnA agent.

projects.title: Voice AI Assitant
projects.bodyText:
A receptionist that helps you to book, schedule, cancel appointments.
 It works like conversational AI, you can conversate about life and other things too.

projects.title: Ecommerce Crawler
projects.bodyText:
EcommerceCrawler is an asynchronous web crawler designed to extract product URLs and their metadata from e-commerce domains.
 Will track the prices and notify the users for a change. 
 Integrated telegram for notification.

projects.title: AI Headshot generator
projects.bodyText:
Give the prompt and have a professional face generated for your face.
 - Different training and testing server to train and test images.
 - Files can be uploaded in zip format.

projects.title: Podcast Summarizer
projects.bodyText:
- A Tool to trascribe and summarize any video, youtube channel
 - Summarise the data points in a compact manner.

projects.title: AI Powered Data extraction from Invoice
projects.bodyText:
Extracting informations from PDFs especially from invoice data is a complicated process.
 This tool will help us to get the required informations from the document in seconds and store it in a tabular form so that we can download it and use for analysis.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Defi React APP
projects.bodyText: - Made a Defi application using React with tailwind CSS.
